key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on specific suppliers and global semiconductor shortages
Market cyclicality impacting revenue stability and growth prospects
Intense competitive pressure from larger industry players
Regulatory and trade risks, particularly with China and U.S. export controls
controversies: Class-action lawsuit alleging improper overtime pay practices under California labor laws
Recent insider selling activity raising concerns about confidence in near-term prospects
social_issues: Legal challenges related to labor practices
governance_issues: Insider trading activity potentially indicating governance concerns
